articles.author: Alicia Wallace
articles.title: Yellen: 'Not anticipating a downturn' in the US economy - CNN
articles.description: US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she believes the American economy remains strong and its banking system is resilient despite some recent turmoil among regional financial institutions.
articles.content:
US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she believes the American economy remains strong and its banking system is resilient despite some recent turmoil among regional financial institutions.
